name: Stumpy the Armadillo
description:
Stumpy the Armadillo can only jump and roll, sad. It's limbs are only useful for positioning.

Move Stumpy the Armadillo to collect as many rings as possible within the time limit.

Keys:

W - Extend Left Arm
I - Extend Right Arm
A - Extend Left Leg
L - Extend Right Leg

Space - Armadillo will propel itself depending on where his head is facing, Upwards = Jump, Sideways/Downwards = Roll

Shoutout to Spongebob for the backing track.

Dev High Score: 173
